attributes.action: To drive awareness of the ongoing civil war in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and to put pressure on on suppliers of Cobalt, Coltan and Cassiterite to supply only legitimatly supplied ore and to introduce a "fairtrade" option in electrical products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister to help drive awareness of the ongoing conflict in the Democratic Republic of the Congo. We also petition the Prime Minister to put pressure on suppliers of minerals mined from the Congo to supply only legitamitly mined ores and to prove this legitamicy. Finally we petition the Prime Minister to introduce a "Fairtrade" option on electrical goods so that the British Public can have the choice between Fairtrade and non-fairtrade electrical devices.
